verses.text: Then David said , This \add is\add* the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God , and this \add is\add* the altar of the burnt offering for Israel.
And David commanded to gather together the strangers that \add were\add* in the land of Israel ; and he set masons to hew wrought stones to build the house of God.
And David prepared iron in abundance for the nails for the doors of the gates , and for the joinings ; and brass in abundance without weight ;
Also cedar trees in abundance : for the Zidonians and they of Tyre brought much cedar wood to David.

And David said , Solomon my son \add is\add* young and tender , and the house \add that is\add* to be builded for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add must be\add* exceeding magnifical , of fame and of glory throughout all countries : I will \add therefore\add* now make preparation for it. So David prepared abundantly before his death. \p
¶ Then he called for Solomon his son , and charged him to build an house for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God of Israel.
And David said to Solomon , My son , as for me, it was in my mind to build an house unto the name of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my God :

But the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to me, saying , Thou hast shed blood abundantly , and hast made great wars : thou shalt not build an house unto my name , because thou hast shed much blood upon the earth in my sight.

Behold, a son shall be born to thee, who shall be a man of rest ; and I will give him rest from all his enemies round about : for his name shall be Solomon , and I will give peace and quietness unto Israel in his days.\f + \fr 22.9 \ft Solomon: that is, Peaceable\f*
He shall build an house for my name ; and he shall be my son , and I \add will be\add* his father ; and I will establish the throne of his kingdom over Israel for ever.

Now, my son , the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* be with thee; and prosper thou, and build the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God , as he hath said of thee.

Only the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* give thee wisdom and understanding , and give thee charge concerning Israel , that thou mayest keep the law of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God.

Then shalt thou prosper , if thou takest heed to fulfil the statutes and judgments which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* charged Moses with concerning Israel : be strong , and of good courage ; dread not, nor be dismayed.

Now, behold, in my trouble I have prepared for the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* an hundred thousand talents of gold , and a thousand thousand talents of silver ; and of brass and iron without weight ; for it is in abundance : timber also and stone have I prepared ; and thou mayest add thereto.\f + \fr 22.14 \ft trouble: or, poverty\f*

Moreover \add there are\add* workmen with thee in abundance , hewers and workers of stone and timber , and all manner of cunning men for every manner of work.\f + \fr 22.15 \ft workers…: that is, masons and carpenters\f*
Of the gold , the silver , and the brass , and the iron , \add there is\add* no number. Arise \add therefore\add*, and be doing , and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* be with thee. \p
¶ David also commanded all the princes of Israel to help Solomon his son , \add saying\add*,

\add Is\add* not the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your God with you? and hath he \add not\add* given you rest on every side ? for he hath given the inhabitants of the land into mine hand ; and the land is subdued before the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and before his people.

Now set your heart and your soul to seek the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your God ; arise therefore, and build ye the sanctuary of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* God , to bring the ark of the covenant of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and the holy vessels of God , into the house that is to be built to the name of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
